What is this thing?

This isn’t really a website, and it’s not really a blog. It’s more-or-less a place that allows me to share ad-hoc notes via the interwebs.

The notes stored here will usually be about Practicing Ruby, but they may be about other stuff on occasion too.

If you want to track when updates are made to this website, check out its repository on Github.

If you want to discuss something with me, you can email me, or tweet something to @practicingruby.
